Plot: Story of a promising high school basketball star and his relationships with two brothers, one a drug dealer and the other a former basketball star fallen on hard times and now employed as a security guard.
Title: Above the Rim
Writer: Jeff Pollack (story), Benny Medina (story), Barry Michael Cooper (screenplay), Jeff Pollack (screenplay)
Actors: Duane Martin, Leon, Tupac Shakur, David Bailey
